attributes.action: Save the 'Flat Iron' DO NOT SELL OUR GREEN SPACE
attributes.additional_details: We as a community are opposing any plans for 1. The sale of the 'Flat Iron' and 2. Anything other than affordable housing to be built on the other 2 sites. In the Councils draft local plans the 'Flat Iron' is designated public open green space and in the local plans the other 2 sites have plans for 94 houses to be built across the 2 sites. The 'Flat Iron' should NOT BE SOLD!! Our community NEEDS affordable HOUSES not apartment blocks. Stop property developers ruining OUR COMMUNITIES!!
attributes.background: Stop Councils being able to sell designated public open green space to developers. I am a resident in Liverpool 8, our Council is wanting to sell of the famous 'Flat Iron' to a local property developer along with two other sites, Head street and Gore/ Harrington Street.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
